attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Government departments work seamlessly to ensure that the health and wellbeing of the disabled and elderly are ensured and that the government policy on Fair Access to Care Services do not preclude any person of advice or support.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
